name: Waverider
title: Waverider
desc: A mysterious waterborne vehicle equipped with a magical weapon. With its deck beneath your feet, there is no waterway you cannot effortlessly traverse.
in_play_description:
When played: Grants the character to which this is attached 2 Shield points.
When the character to which this is attached is switched out: This card Usage(s) +1.
Technique: Waverider: Swiftstrike Cannon
Usage(s): 2
